Yujie Zheng

Water know

Water Knows is a zine that uses water as a visual metaphor to trace my emotional journey through graduation season. From anxiety and uncertainty to quiet release, each page captures the shifting states of emotion through natural water stains. Blending personal reflection with broader mental health awareness, this project becomes a quiet emotional archive�a reminder that our feelings deserve to be noticed, felt, and understood.

https://kkkkkkzyj.cargo.site/8-typeface
